results.title: LIVE LAUGH LOVE Cuff Aluminum Bracelet/ Inspirational/ Best Friend/ Sister/ Mother/ Hand Stamped/ Personalized Jewelry
results.description:
This bracelet is hand stamped with the phrase " Live Laugh Love" with a heart stamped on the cuff. The perfect gift for your best friend, sister or mother.


This gift can be personalized with the quote or phrase of your choice. This bracelet is made to order by me and stamped one letter at a time.


This bracelet measures 3/8 wide by 6"long and can be adjusted to fit most wrist. I only use 1100 pure aluminum(sturdy 14 gauge, food grade, hypoallergenic), which has a much lower skin reaction and won't tarnish!!!


Please be advised that I stamp every word letter by letter, so spacing and depth of letters may vary slightly and letters are not always perfectly aligned.

results.title: It's The Time To Live Your Life Shirt,  Vegan Shirt Funny, Sleep Shirt, Friends Shirt, Self Care, Positive Shirts, Essential Worker Tee
results.description:
Dear Customer,

Due to Corona-Virus situation:

- the shipping and producing time of some ordered items can be longer,
- some of color/size combo can be out of stock temporarily. 

If you will have any questions, please contact us!

Thank you for your understanding!
_____________________________________________________________

It's The Time To Live Your Life Shirt, Vegan Shirt Funny, Sleep Shirt, Friends Shirt, Self Care, Positive Shirts, Essential Worker Tee, Live Love Laugh, Gift For Her, Holiday Pajamas, Flower Power,  Nurse Graduation,  Comfort Colors Tshirt

#It'sTheTimeToLiveYourLifeShirt, #VeganShirtFunny, #SleepShirt, #FriendsShirt, #SelfCare, #PositiveShirts, #EssentialWorkerTee, #LiveLoveLaugh, #GiftForHer, #HolidayPajamas, #FlowerPower, #NurseGraduation, #ComfortColorsTshirt


This super soft 100% cotton T-shirt with a unique custom design is your PERFECT shirt for YOU. We proudly use high-quality materials and only high-quality print. Wear it with jeans or your trendy shorts. You really will LOVE it, and never want to take it off! ♥♥♥

♥---DESIGN ---♥
This UNISEX Bella & Canvas T-shirt is made with premium quality knit cotton jersey for both men and women. Superior Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, unisex sizing, shoulder taping, and short sleeves features. A modern unisex fitted shirt, this style features a crew neck and contoured side seams for a stylish trendy t-shirt. Fabrication: 100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 32 single 4.2 oz.

♥---SIZING ---♥
Unisex shirt with variety of colors and sizes.
The sizes are looser and longer than a typical woman tees. So we recommend to order one size down for women for fitted look. (Please make sure to measure yourself well before give the order. Thank you.)

Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL

Chest / Full Body Length Chart:
-> X-SMALL: 17" Chest x 28" Length
-> SMALL: 18" Chest x 28" Length
-> MEDIUM: 20" Chest x 29" Length
-> LARGE: 22" Chest x 30" Length
-> X-LARGE: 24" Chest x 31" Length
-> 2X-LARGE: 26" Chest x 32" Length
-> 3X-LARGE: 28" Chest x 33" Length

* Disclaimer: Please note that the above sizing chart is subject to change.

♥---CARE - INSTRUCTION ---♥ 
Follow these care instructions to enjoy long-term your T-shirt and its custom design.
Machine wash cold, inside-out, gentle cycle with mild detergent and similar colors. Use non-chlorine bleach, only when necessary. No fabric softeners. Tumble dry low or hang-dry for longest life. Cool iron inside-out if necessary. Do not iron decoration. Do not dry clean.


♥---HOW TO ORDER---♥
  1. Choose your RIGHT SIZE from the drop-down menu.
  2. Choose the QUANTITY of your order from the drop-down menu.
  3. Hit the button "ADD TO CART".
  4. Let us know all info for your order in the "Notes to seller" section by checkout.
  5. That's it!
  6. We will let you know about your order and shipping details.


♥---SHIPPING INFO---♥
Please make sure your address on file with Etsy is up to date. The BesteeShop will not be responsible for any outdated or incorrect shipping information provided. Your order will be fine for shipping in 6-10 business days in the US. Please allow 5-8 additional business days for delivery from the USPS/DHL when shipping within the United States. Shipping time to Canada 10-15  business days, international shipping (out of the US and Canada) takes 15-30 business days.


♥--- I M P O R T A N T - I N F O ---♥

** Every tee is made to order. It takes a few days before being able to ship. 
** Colors may vary slightly from monitor to printed product. This can be due to different monitor settings used and the nature of handcrafted products.
** Please make sure your shipping address is correct PRIOR to check out as this can not be changed afterward. BesteeShop is NOT responsible for shipping addresses that are not correct.
** No refunds or exchanges due to ordering the wrong size. Please refer to the size chart. ** 
** Made in the U.S.A.

If you have any questions please feel to free contact us through the 'Contact shop owner' button. Do not hesitate to let us know everything you need prior to ordering.

Designs by ©BesteeShop. @ BESTEESHOP 2020   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

results.title: Black onyx message bracelet, adjustable chain clasp - Live, Laugh, Love - sterling silver - root chakra
results.description:
This message bracelet carries the root chakra grounding energy of black onyx to anchor energies to Live, Laugh, Love in the physical. A sterling silver clasp includes a chain fastening to adjust the size.

Traditional lore:
Onyx - earth element, root chakra - focus, grounding

The star at the clasp is my signature. It represents our connection to Mother Earth, by the choice of a grounding stone, and the Divine, through the shape of a star.

I work with the energy of the crystals, colors and other materials to create works of art to enhance your Spirit. Traditional lore about these materials is taken into consideration when combining elements. It is my personal belief that these energies influence our daily lives in many ways at many levels...spiritual, emotional and physical...to create balance in the chakras, support change to advance us on our life path, or clear blockages. However, no medical claims are being made for these materials. Information provided is about spiritual support to healing and offered to enhance the enjoyment and understanding of your purchase in order to learn about historical uses of crystals. This is not healthcare information and you should always consult your doctors for treatment of any disorders.

Length: 7.25 to 8 inches

B5552

results.title: Kama Mala Bracelet | Brazilian Red Garnet | Amazonite | AAA Gemstones | Reiki Mala Beads | Yoga | Live Love Laugh | Magic | Passion | Energy
results.description:
There is nothing quite like the feeling of love-soaked, drenching, inescapable, soul-reaching passion. Where you can't remember whose heart is beating in whose chest or whose blood is rushing through your veins. When every cell comes alive..

The Kama Mala Bracelet is filled with powerful vibrations to attract intense love and passion, renew your lust for life, and/or heal existing relationships. Made with gorgeous violet red Garnet gemstones, a single sky blue Amazonite gem and an antique silver tone "Live Laugh Love" charm to fill your world with fireworks, heat, energy, magic, ecstasy, love and laughter. 

Kama काम is a Sanskrit word meaning "sexual love, desire, wish or longing" in Indian literature. Think Kama Sutra.

Garnet is a powerfully energizing and regenerating gemstone. It revitalizes, purifies, and balances energy, bringing serenity or passion as appropriate. It inspires love, trust, devotion and commitment. It enhances sensuality, warmth and intimacy in a relationship. Red Garnet also brings courage to a crisis situation that seemed hopeless by fortifying, activating, and strengthening the survival instinct via the root chakra. It stimulates confidence, boosts energy, encourages positive thoughts, and controls self-anger. Garnet reinvigorates the entire body, stimulating metabolism and re-energizing the chakras. It activates other crystals, amplifying their effect. It is also known to bring business success to the person wearing it.

Amazonite is known as the "lucky hope gemstone" because it is said to be lucky for all of your hopes and dreams. These beautiful gems dissipate negative energy and blockages, giving you an extra boost of confidence, courage and hope. At the mental level, it filters information passing through the brain and combines it with intuition. At an emotional level, Amazonite soothes fear, worry, anger and emotional trauma. It calms the brain and nervous system and helps the body maintain optimum health. It is an excellent stone to help you see both sides of a problem or different points of view. Amazonite is widely associated with luck, money and overall success by enhancing communication and aligning ideas with inner visions and inspiration. It releases the stress associated with confrontations, bringing clarity and truth to your intention and empowering you to manifest your dreams into reality. 

All Sacred Health Jewelry is cleared with sage and infused with healing energy by Brenda Pharaoh, ETP, SC, HHP, ARP, RMT ~ Energy Therapy Practitioner, Spiritual Counselor, Holistic Health Practitioner, Advanced Reiki (Shaman) Practitioner, Reiki Master Teacher, Professional Medium.

Each mala includes a description of the healing properties along with a pamphlet that explains the benefits of crystal healing, the value of Reiki infused gemstones and our one-year limited warranty.

8mm high quality crystals, hand-laced on strong elastic stretch cord. One size fits most wrists, 6.5” circumference. We are happy to accommodate special size requests. Feel free to leave us a note in the messages section at checkout. There is no extra charge for custom sizing.

Since all stones  found in nature have unique ‘fingerprints’ of their own, color tones, striations and patterns may vary slightly. 
*************************************
Exclusive Original Designs. ©2016 Sacred Health Jewelry. All rights reserved.

Facebook: Sacred Health Jewelry
Instagram: @sacredhealthjewelry
Official website: sacredhealthjewelry.com
Healing website: www.sacred-health.com
**************************************
“Passion. It's about falling in love with yourself first. It's about knowing who you are and living unapologetically. It’s about being yourself, unbound and unrestricted, no matter what anybody thinks of you. It’s about finding your own alignment, and then offering to share your wholeness with another. 

When you merge with a similar soul, the energy between the two of you will ignite. The electricity will force its way through you. Nothing will make sense and yet everything will make sense. You can try to contain it but your higher self will want more. And more. It will want to grow, expand and amplify. It will change you, rock you and shake you into an awareness that was never there before. 

The fireworks, the heat, the magic, the ecstasy. Soon you won’t be able to tell whose heart is beating in whose chest or whose blood is rushing through you. Every cell will come alive. It's the atmosphere, the noise, the time, the taste, the smell. It’s being AWAKE. It’s so blissful that it's near painful. 

This kind of soul-reaching, drenching, inescapable passion fuses two people together to expand and ascend in this life and beyond. Once experienced, it can never be unlearned, and it will forever be craved. When allowed to flourish without expectation or resistance, it’s an experience that is unparalleled and unmatched by anything else in all the Universe.” ~Brenda Pharaoh

NEW HEALER COLLECTION:
For the earth angels of our planet who were born with a need to help others, our new healer bracelets were designed to help raise your vibration, strengthen intuition, stimulate spiritual visions, clarify divine insight and protect your energy field from negativity and energy drain. For men or women. https://sacredhealthjewelry.com/shop/30727418/healer-collection

NEW PHOTO GALLERY:
Humans doing human things wearing Sacred Health Jewelry :)

results.title: Live Laugh Love Wood Sign Wall Art, Laugh Sign, Love Sign Wood, Laughter is Timeless, Inspirational Quote Signs, Inspiring Wall Art Quotes
results.description:
These sets of three wood signs reading LIVE, LAUGH, LOVE feature my original photo letter art... and make great gifts, or perfect little pieces for your own home décor!

There are two different size options for these sets:  Micro (smaller size) and Mini (a bit bigger, but still small).

Measurements of MICRO: (micro signs can stand alone... they do not hang on the wall).
LIVE:                   3 3/4 inches wide/long x 1 1/2 inches tall/high 
LOVE:                    3 3/4 x 1 1/2 inches
LAUGH :                 4 1/2 x 1 1/2 inches

Measurements of MINI:  (mini signs can stand alone and also have a metal hanger on the back for easy wall hanging). 
LIVE:   8 1/2 inches x 3 1/2 inches
LOVE:  8 1/2 x 3 1/2
LAUGH: 8 1/2 X 2. 1/2

You may also choose just LOVE or LAUGH in the mini sizes, as shown here. 

LOVE Letters are my Original photos (photos that I took myself) applied to wood.  I sand and paint the wood black, and apply the letters.  There is a coat of polyurethane over the top for an added layer of protection.  
Indoor display only, and keep dry and away from extreme heat.  

If you're in Lincoln, NE, and want to pick up your sign when it's ready, please contact me before purchasing. I will give you a coupon code to remove the shipping cost. If this coupon code is used, then that means buyer agrees to pick up the item locally when finished, and seller will not ship item. 

Please visit my other shop, Barr Trading Co. for great retro, vintage, home décor, supplies, and more, at http://barrtradingco.etsy.com

results.title: Live Love Laugh Burlap Bag with LED Battery Operated Timer Candle with Berries
results.description: Burlap sack with stenciled "LIVE, LOVE, LAUGH" on the front and a frayed black and tan homespun drawstring. There is an Star Stenciled LED Grungy Battery Operated Timer Candle and a burgundy, black and mustard pip berry ring with rusty stars in the sack.  Turn the candle on and it will automatically go out after several hours and go back on the same time the next day. The candle takes two AA batteries (not included).  The sack and light measures 14"h x 8"w x 4"d.  This is a great light for a hutch, a dark corner, inside a hutch or a shelf.
materials: Pip berry ring with rusty stars

results.title: Coffee Is Proof - Coffee/Tea Mug
results.description:
**May arrive after Dec 25**

Our mugs are made using the highest-grade ceramic and go through a high-quality sublimation process that adheres specialty inks to the face of the mugs, leaving a permanent image on your mug! You can be sure that the design will not rub, peel, or scratch off as they do on vinyl stickers. We package all our mugs safely in a form fitting foam so that your mug will not move around while shipping!

results.title: Timeless Treasures - Live Laugh Love - Large Daisies - Black - Cotton Fabric by the Yard C4426-BLK
results.description:
We ALWAYS send continuous yardage when available, or if not available, we will contact you prior to shipping!

Colors include white, grey, yellow, black, green and hint of orange.

100% cotton fabric.  Machine wash warm, mild detergent, non-chlorine bleach, tumble dry low, use warm iron.

To see other fabrics we HAVE in this collection go to:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/FabricUtopia?ref=hdr_shop_menu&search_query=Timeless+Treasures+Live+Love+Laugh

As we also sell this fabric in our retail shop, sometimes our inventory is off.  You can leave instructions for us including how you want the order shipped.   This helps avoid any delays that might happen by trying to contact you.  The choices are as follows:

ORDERED AMOUNT ONLY - Cancel the order if you do not have the stated amount in continuous yardage.
SEND WHAT YOU HAVE - Send the amount you have. We will adjust the prices and shipping accordingly.
CONTACT ME - If you do NOT have the exact amount, please contact me for instructions (the default for our shop).
SEE NOTE - Leave any instructions in the customers note section.

CHOOSE YOUR FABRIC LENGTH FROM THE FOLLOWING:
1/4 yards ( 9 inches x 44 inches)
FAT QUARTER (18 inches x 22 inches) 
1/2 yards (18 inches x 44 inches)
3/4 yards (27 inches x 44 inches)
1 yard (36 inches x 44 inches)
1 1/4 yards (45 inches x 44 inches)
1 1/2 yards (54 inches x 44 inches)

The quantity button will allow you to purchase 1/4 yard, 1/2 yard, 3/4 yard, 1 yard, 1-1/4 yard and 1-1/2 yard cuts along with fat quarters. The price is listed next to the size in the drop down menu.   Multiple quantities will be cut in a single continuous piece unless otherwise stated.  Do not order more yardage than what is listed in the drop down box.

Example:  If you wish to purchase 3 yards, select the 1 yard cut from the drop down menu and then a quantity of 3.  You can purchase multiple lengths of the same fabric as long as it does not exceed the total quantity listed on the drop down menu.

Fabric cut sizes are approximate as the width of cotton fabrics vary between 43 and 45 inches.  Fabric is cut with a rotary cutter on a ruled mat to provide you with the straight cuts whenever possible.

If you need a custom listing for a length not listed or would like help in coordinating or calculating yardage for your projects, please convo us or request a custom listing via the custom order button at the top right of this page.  Sometimes we have more fabric in stock than what is listed.   If for some reason we have less fabric than shown, we will contact you for instructions unless otherwise instructed.  

Shipping is via first class mail for up to 2 yards. 3 to 8 yards ship via a priority flat rate envelope.   We use calculated shipping based on weight, and offer "FREE" domestic Priority Mail shipping on orders higher orders, this will be displayed when ordering..  Shipping upgrades and international rates are available at check-out.  If a significant overcharge in shipping happens due to a combined or multiple yard purchase, it will be refunded to you.   When buying multiple quantities of small fabric yardage shipping prices can be off and force priority mail prices before needed.   Please let us know if you wish first class shipping in this case.

We try to show multiple images of each fabric.  The first is usually from the Manufacturer or supplier.  The second displays a ruler so that you can get an idea of the size of the fabric design and pattern.  Others are usually close ups or project ideas.   NOTE:  Sometimes the pictures we take vary in color from the manufacturer's picture due to cameras, lighting and other factors.  In most cases, the first image will be the most accurate in displaying the true color(s).
